repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: National Association of Corporation Schools Minutes and Publications
did.abstract: Minutes and pamphlets of the National Association of Corporation Schools.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Founded in 1913, the National Association of Corporation Schools was a corporate training and consulting group that provided a variety of educational and management development services to businesses, government agencies and individuals. In 1923 it became the American Management Association.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of minutes and pamphlets of the National Association of Corporation Schools.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: National Association of Corporation Schools Minutes and Publications #5452. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
